title: Perma-ban
body: It has been a while since this account has been permanently banned.Honestly, I am still baffled about the reason I was permabanned. I only remember using lolreplay to change the login screen. I have had this acc since 2011 and I have an attachment to it. So if I'm going to accept being banned. Please at least send me a game I was "caught" using third-party programs in.

replies.body: Good luck buddy, especially with the current states of riots player punishment system. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
